credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Roy P. Frangiamore
dimensions:
H x W (a): 259.1 x 76.8 cm (8 ft. 6 in. x 30 1/4 in.) selvedge to selvedge
H x W (b): 257.8 x 55.2 cm (8 ft. 5 1/2 in. x 21 3/4 in.)
H x W (c): 127.6 x 16.5 cm (50 1/4 x 6 1/2 in.)
Repeat H x W: 19.4 x 29.2 cm (7 5/8 x 11 1/2 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
description: Fabric printed with floral patterns in a field and side border, to be used as a hanging or bed cover, in reds and yellows, now faded. The floral patterns of the field and border are designed to be seen from either end, making it easy to join two lengths, one turned 180 degrees, to make a large field with a border on left and right.
name: Textile
